law.catch_line: Subject to the hearing provisions of § 6.5-315 of this subtitle, the Board, on the affirmative vote...

section.section: Instead of or in addition to reprimanding a licensee or suspending or revoking a license under this subsection, the Board may impose a penalty not exceeding $5,000 for each violation.
The Board shall pay any penalty collected under this subsection into the General Fund of the State.
